titles.title: To authorize certain uses of water from the Solano Project, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 7/31/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, using facilities associated with the Solano Project, California, to enter into water contracts with the Solano County Water Agency or any of its member contractors for: (1) the impounding, storage, and carriage of nonproject water for domestic, municipal, industrial, and other purposes; and (2) the exchange of water among such contractors for such purposes.
